first_buy.hover: Check this box if turnips were bought from Daisy Mae on your island for the first time this week.

reset_dialogue.title: Are you sure?
reset_dialogue.text: Beginning a new week will delete all data from the previous week. There is no way to retrieve this data. Please be certain you wish to continue.

ui.bad_data: Your data does not match any known pattern; please ensure it is correct.
